idea:

We connect societal well-being to productivity and
profitability, helping corporates, non-profits, family
offices, and philanthropists find unique solutions to mould an effective triple bottom line.

business. It sieves and channelizes conversations

We honour dialogue with its dividend, we honour

idea:
ALpha OPtical Technologies Pvt. Ltd. proudly introduces itself as one of India’s Youngest Defence Start-up with budding and dynamic entrepreneurs, aiming to Make in India, optics for defence & space applications. We feel privileged to announce that our upcoming Optics Manufacturing Facility will be amongst the most promising infrastructures in the country.

Our goal is to offer quality optics that meet the international standards with cost effective solutions to utmost customer satisfaction and thereby reducing the dependency on imports. We have made a commitment to deliver the highest quality in optical elements by utilizing current technologies & solutions, customer priorities and schedules by striving for the perfection in service and quality.

Our team consists of qualified engineers and technicians hailing from the optical background that have the ability to implement stringent quality standards throughout the manufacturing & inspection stages thereby ensuring that the right product is delivered at the right time.

We also possess the ability to generate and create unique solutions for complex optics manufacturing techniques and can work closely from prototyping stage to the bulk manufacturing stages.

ALOP is also associated with MH Optics, Israel, who are having 3 decades of experience in precision optics and are also a pioneer in new generation Chalcogenide materials and hemi spherical (IR) domes. Our partner MH Optics Ltd is also having rich heritage in space optics and has the necessary resources for offering large size Zerodur mirrors with light weighting & polishing up to 1500 mm. We together can again offer optical solutions for Space and Defence applications covering all Glasses, IR materials such as Germanium, Silicon, Calcium Fluoride, Zinc Sulphide, Zinc Selenide & Chalcogenide materials to suit the application and the demands.

Our goal is to maximize customer satisfaction by providing accurate optical and metrology solutions.
name: ALPHA OPTICAL TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea: Wilderlust was born with one burning desire, to share with others the magic of the wilderness here in India, as we have experienced it, thanks to the incredible diversity of wildlife and landscapes of our country. What do we different? An iconic wilderness location for your stay, high quality roof prism to view wildlife up close, a professional naturalist to guide your journey and a 5-6 minute video highlight reel of your entire trip will be recorded so you can relive the experience and share the same with family & friends.
name: WILDERLUST EXPEDITIONS LLP
